RakhyadeshabadEnglish.english: sir mastak rakhayeaa paarabrahama(n) hast kaayaa rakhayeaa paramesavaireh ||
aatam rakhayeaa gopaal suaamee dhan charan rakhayeaa jagadheesavaireh ||
sarab rakhayeaa gur dhayaaleh bhai dhookh binaasaneh ||
bhagat vachhal anaath naathe saran naanak purakh achuteh ||52||
ghor dhukhaye(n) anik hataye(n) janam dhaaridhra(n) mahaa bikhayeaadha(n) ||
miTa(n)t sagal simara(n)t har naam naanak jaise paavak kaasaT bhasama(n) karot ||18||
soraTh mahalaa panjavaa ||
gur kaa sabadh rakhavaare ||
chaukee chaugiradh hamaare ||
raam naam man laagaa ||
jam lajai kar bhaagaa ||1||
prabh jee too mero sukhadhaataa ||
ba(n)dhan kaaT kare man niramal pooran purakh bidhaataa
|| rahaau ||
naanak prabh abinaasee ||
taa kee sev na birathee jaasee ||
anadh kareh tere dhaasaa ||
jap pooran hoiee aasaa ||2||4||68||
bilaaval mahalaa panjavaa ||
taatee vaau na lagiee paarabraham saranaiee ||
chaugiradh hamaarai raam kaar dhukh lagai na bhaiee ||1||
satigur pooraa bheTiaa jin banat banaiee ||
raam naam aaukhadh dheeaa ekaa liv laiee ||1||
rahaau ||
raakh le'ee tin rakhanahaar sabh biaadh miTaiee ||
kahu naanak kirapaa bhiee prabh bhe sahaiee ||2||15||79||
salok ||
jeh saadhoo gobidh bhajan keeratan naanak neet ||
naa hau naa too(n) neh chhuTeh nikaT na jaieeahu dhoot ||1||
salok mahalaa panjavaa ||
man meh chitavau chitavanee udham karau uTh neet ||
har keeratan kaa aaharo har dheh naanak ke meet ||1||
